name: issuedepyt
title: Issue Dependencies
description: Visualize issue dependencies in a graph or tree. Dependent issues found can also be visualized in a timeline if sprints, start date and/or due data fields are set.
changeNotes:
Version 1.4.0:
- Add setting for sprints field.
- Use sprints to derive start and end dates for timeline.
- Use sprints to show if ticket is planned or unplanned.
- Add search highlight based on sprints.
- Improved select and highlight visibility in node graph.
- Fix calculation of number of working days.
- Fix loss of selection at reload.
